text: VALUE = log2 gcrma normalized signal intensities

protocol.text: 35S::LFY-GR and WT seedlings were treated with 10uM dexamethasone, 0.1% ethanol, for 4 hours essentially as described (Wagner et al., 1999).

Seeds cold-treated for 7 days at 4°C were grown in inductive conditions (continuous light or 16 hour long-day light conditions) at 23°C at a fluence rate of 45 μmol/m2 sec on 0.5x Murashige and Skoog plates
RNA was extracted from four independent pools of apices using TRI-Reagent followed by column purification (RNeasy kit; QIAGEN).
RNA was amplified and labeled using NuGEN's Ovation™ RNA kits according to the manufacturer's instructions.
Hybridization to the Affymetrix Arabidopsis ATH1 array was performed at the University of Pennsylvania Microarray Core Facility using standard Affymetrix protocols.
Scanning was performed at the University of Pennsylvania Microarray Core Facility using standard Affymetrix protocols.

Microarray data were processed using Bioconductor packages in R. Data were gcRMA normalized (Wu et al., 2004). Non-specific filtering was performed with the MAS5.0 algorithm for genes that were ‘Present’ in at least 2 of 4 arrays in at least one treatment group (genotype) (McClintick and Edenberg, 2006). Differentially expressed genes were identified using LIMMA (Smyth, 2004).
